name: Hydreigon
author: Hideki Ishikawa
flavor_text: It responds to movement by attacking. This scary, three-headed Pokémon devours everything in its path!

attacks.name: Cruel Fang
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Dark Burn
attacks.effect: Discard as many {D} Energy attached to your Pokémon as you like. This attack does 50 damage times the amount of {D} Energy you discarded in this way.
